1 import os
2 import subprocess
3 
4 from niryo_robot_programs_manager.ProgramsFileManager import ProgramsFileManager, FileDoesNotExistException
5 from niryo_robot_programs_manager.programs_manager_enums import LanguageEnum
6 
7 triple_quotes = '"""'
8 len_triple_quotes = len(triple_quotes)
9 line_jump = "\n"
10 len_line_jump = len(line_jump)
11 
12 
13 class PythonFileManager(ProgramsFileManager):
14  def __init__(self, base_dir, language):
15 
16  if language == LanguageEnum.PYTHON2:
17  self.__version_number = 2
18  elif language == LanguageEnum.PYTHON3:
19  self.__version_number = 3
20  else:
21  raise ValueError('PythonFileManager language must be a python language')
22 
23  self.associated_path = f'python{self.__version_number}'
24 
25  programs_dir = os.path.join(base_dir, self.associated_path)
26  super(PythonFileManager, self).__init__(progs_dir=programs_dir,
27  language=language,
28  extension=".py",
29  runnable=True)
30 
31  self.__process = None
32 
33  @staticmethod
34  def _generate_raw_text(code, description):
35 
36  file_text = triple_quotes + "\n"
37  file_text += description + "\n"
38  file_text += triple_quotes + "\n"
39  file_text += code + "\n"
40  return file_text
41 
42  def execute(self, name):
43  if not self.exists(name):
44  raise FileDoesNotExistException
45  try:
46  self.__process = subprocess.Popen([f'python{self.__version_number}', self._path_from_name(name)],
47  stdout=subprocess.PIPE,
48  stderr=subprocess.PIPE)
49  stdout, stderr = self.__process.communicate()
50  except Exception as e:
51  return False, str(e), ''
52 
53  if stderr:
54  return False, stderr, ''
55 
56  return True, "Execution success", stdout
57 
58  def stop_execution(self):
59  if self.__process is None:
60  return False, "No Process is running"
61  try:
62  self.__process.terminate()
63  except Exception as e:
64  return False, str(e)
65 
66  return True, "Execution stopped"
67 
68  def read(self, name):
69  raw_file = self._read_raw_file(name)
70 
71  # Check if description
72  if not raw_file.startswith(triple_quotes):
73  return raw_file, ""
74  # Find end of description
75  index_second_quotes = raw_file.find(triple_quotes, len_triple_quotes)
76  # Cut description
77  description = raw_file[len_triple_quotes + len_line_jump:index_second_quotes]
78  if description.endswith(line_jump):
79  description = description[:-len_line_jump]
80 
81  # The remaining text is code
82  code = raw_file[index_second_quotes + len_triple_quotes + len_line_jump:]
83 
84  return code, description
